snippet.title: Puyo Puyo Tetris 2 | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Puyo Puyo Tetris 2 is now available on Nintendo Switch, PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X|S, and Xbox One! Drop into: 
 
📶 Up to 4-player online/local play
📚 A new single-player Adventure story
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 28 characters to choose from
⚔ New RPG-inspired Skill Battles

https://puyo.sega.com/tetris2/
